title: Bug 6536Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: Bug 6536Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing From its context menu select "Add Javadoc"== nothing happens.Either this menu should be removed or (preferably) the action should add thefields Javadoc.
